Gene-centric mapping of microbial metabolic functions 2020.21 MICB425 Capstone project Overview

Gene-centric mapping of microbial metabolic functions 2020.21 MICB425 Capstone project Stephan Koenig, Kim Dill-McFarland, Ryan McLaughlin, Connor Morgan-Lang, Steven Hallam version March 06, 2021 Overview This document introduces metagenomic and metatranscriptomic workflows Part I outlines the motivation and insights afforded by meta’omic workflows. Part II provides hands-on tutorials to learn to important tools, TreeSAPP and iTOL. Part III is a capstone project to explore the meta’omics data collected from the Saanich Inlet watercolumn. Bookdown is under construction
